pr_title: Add link in digital twins query APIs to limitations documentation

timeline.message: Add link in digital twins query APIs to limitations documentation

timeline.bodyText: The note seemed a little hard to understand. This might be better - 'there may be a delay between changes in your instance reflecting in queries'?
timeline.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText: I used the same language that is used in the official document that is being linked
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Going by the previous PR discussion, if we remove 'between' from the wording, it should be good. "Note that there may be a delay before changes in your instance are reflected in queries."
replies.author: vinagesh
